LanguageData.PRT_OrbitalTargeter_GarbageRainNoLOS.des: An orbital garbage rain targeter that ignores line of sight. Designate any coordinates on the map to guide an orbital debris drop.
LanguageData.PRT_OrbitalGarbageRainController.label: orbital garbage rain controller
LanguageData.PRT_Skyfaller_GarbageRain_Meteor.label: meteor (incoming)
LanguageData.PRT_Building_SatelliteWreck.label: satellite wreckage
LanguageData.PRT_Building_SatelliteWreck.description: A satellite wreck that crashed to the ground. Can be deconstructed to recover steel and components.
